statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
As we know, Rikka is poor at math. Yuta is worrying about this situation, so he gives Rikka some math tasks to practice. There is one of them:


One day, Yuta got a string which contains n letters but Rikka lost it in accident. Now they want to recover the string. Yuta remembers that the string only contains lowercase letters and it is not a palindrome string. Unfortunately he cannot remember some letters. Can you help him recover the string?


It is too difficult for Rikka. Can you help her?

statement.title: Input
statement.content: This problem has multi test cases (no more than $20$). For each test case, The first line contains a number $n(1 \leq n \leq 1000)$. The next line contains an n-length string which only contains lowercase letters and ‘?’ – the place which Yuta is not sure.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test cases print a n-length string – the string you come up with. In the case where more than one string exists, print the lexicographically &#64257;rst one. In the case where no such string exists, output “QwQ”.
